video.title: Xena: Warrior Princess
video.synopsis: Bent on redeeming her outlaw past, powerful warrior princess Xena roams the land with her companion Gabrielle in search of wrongs to right.

episodes.synopsis: On the journey home, Xena must defend helpless villagers against the merciless warlord Drago. Along the way, Xena meets plucky young Gabrielle.
episodes.title: Sins of the Past

episodes.synopsis: A wounded Xena is taken in by -- and quite taken by -- a kindly pacifist Trojan, whose village is besieged by an evil warlord.
episodes.title: Chariots of War

episodes.synopsis: When Gabrielle is kidnapped by the henchmen of Morpheus, Xena journeys to an alternate dream world, where she must battle the demons of her past.
episodes.title: Dreamworker

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle find a baby boy in the bulrushes, only to learn that the child has been marked for death by a local king.
episodes.title: Cradle of Hope

episodes.synopsis: When a weapons dealer kidnaps a princess, threats of war soon emerge. To prevent the conflict, Xena must act fast to rescue the maiden.
episodes.title: The Path Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: After Xena is framed for the slaughter of innocent villagers, the evil Ares emerges with an underhanded plan to make her a powerful ally.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: After freeing three Titans from a tomb, Gabrielle tells the giants a little lie: that she's a goddess. Yet her deception yields grave consequences.
episodes.title: The Titans

episodes.synopsis: It's a butt-kicking double date when Xena and Gabrielle team up with Hercules and Iolaus to free Prometheus from bondage.
episodes.title: Prometheus

episodes.synopsis: Crafty King Sisyphus tries to elude his own demise by entrapping Hades' sister Celesta -- also known as Death.
episodes.title: Death in Chains

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle are caught in an escalating feud between the Amazons and the centaurs, and a meddling warlord isn't making things easier.
episodes.title: Hooves & Harlots

episodes.synopsis: When the Black Wolf unleashes Robin Hood-style antics on a village, King Xerxes locks up the Wolf's sympathizers.
episodes.title: The Black Wolf

episodes.synopsis: At the urging of her pal, Helen of Troy, Xena joins a climactic battle of the Trojan War, while Gabrielle rekindles an old flame.
episodes.title: Beware Greeks Bearing Gifts

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle bluffs her way into a storytelling competition at the Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards. There, she befriends aspiring poet Orion.
episodes.title: Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards

episodes.synopsis: Xena joins an assassin and her onetime fiancé, Petracles, on a treasure hunt for a powerful key. Along the way, Gabrielle is attracted to Petracles.
episodes.title: A Fistful of Dinars

episodes.synopsis: To get to the bottom of a mysterious assassination plot on Princess Diana, Xena trades places with the princess, who looks exactly like Xena.
episodes.title: Warrior Princess

episodes.synopsis: Xena is visited by the ghost of her lover, who reveals that a madman has stolen Hades' invisibility helmet to swap the residents of heaven and hell.
episodes.title: Mortal Beloved

episodes.synopsis: Bruce Campbell guest stars as Autolycus, a master thief who helps Xena recover a stolen chest containing the world's most powerful weapon.
episodes.title: The Royal Couple of Thieves

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle travels to her native village, only to find it under siege by a warlord. There, she joins forces with a past-his-prime alcoholic mercenary.
episodes.title: The Prodigal

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle vow to protect a young runaway who fled his home after his mother told him he was to be sacrificed to the gods.
episodes.title: Altared States

episodes.synopsis: Xena saves the life of an old man named Atrius, who professes to be her long-lost father. Meanwhile, Ares tries to lure Xena into leading his army.
episodes.title: Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: After a mysterious poison dart leaves Xena incapacitated, Gabrielle must impersonate the warrior princess in order to protect a village.
episodes.title: The Greater Good

episodes.synopsis: Fierce female warrior Callisto commits heinous acts in Xena's name. But Callisto's sad family history forces Xena to confront her own dark past.
episodes.title: Callisto

episodes.synopsis: Xena teams up with her long-lost brother Toris to destroy Cortese, the evil warlord who ravaged their home village years earlier.
episodes.title: Death Mask

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle turn a temple into a triage unit, where they aid the wounded fighters of a civil war. Gabby tends to a pregnant Amazon woman.
episodes.title: Is There a Doctor in the House?

episodes.synopsis: After answering a distress call from a group of noble centaurs who are trying to protect a sacred stone, Xena reunites with her long-lost son, Solan.
episodes.title: Orphan of War

episodes.synopsis: When Xena defends the temple of the Three Fates from attack, the Fates grant her the chance to go back in time and rewrite her violent past.
episodes.title: Remember Nothing

episodes.synopsis: To help Gabrielle defend the life of a young Israelite named David, Xena fights her old friend Goliath and win freedom for the Philistine people.
episodes.title: The Giant Killer

episodes.synopsis: When the wine god, Bacchus, begins acting out, Xena and Gabrielle go up against his minions to rein him in and restore order.
episodes.title: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun

episodes.synopsis: When Callisto escapes from prison and kills Gabrielle's fiancé, Perdicus, Gabrielle is sent into a dark cycle of hatred and despair.
episodes.title: Return of Callisto

episodes.synopsis: When Xena protects her friend and doppelganger Princess Diana, she stumbles upon their long-lost triplet, a barmaid with a bad reputation.
episodes.title: Warrior...Princess...Tramp

episodes.synopsis: Guilt-ridden over her role in Callisto's death, Xena finds herself a prisoner of her own nightmares, not realizing that Callisto is still involved.
episodes.title: Intimate Stranger

episodes.synopsis: A frustrated Xena remains trapped inside Callisto's body. But the only way out is to help a now-mortal Ares regain his former glory as the god of war.
episodes.title: Ten Little Warlords

episodes.synopsis: It's A Christmas Carol revisited when Gabrielle and Xena come face-to-face with a grouchy king who doesn't believe in celebrating the Winter Solstice.
episodes.title: A Solstice Carol

episodes.synopsis: Thousands of years after Xena's death, a female archeologist finds the long-lost Xena Scrolls and learns of Xena's adventures as a warrior princess.
episodes.title: The Xena Scrolls

episodes.synopsis: When a saboteur sets his (or her?) sights on the Miss Known World beauty pageant, Xena poses as a contestant so she can keep an eye on the action.
episodes.title: Here She Comes...Miss Amphipolis

episodes.synopsis: In part one of a two-part episode, Xena suffers injuries in battle. As she drifts closer to death, she remembers the events that shaped her life.
episodes.title: Destiny (1)

episodes.synopsis: The conclusion of a two-part episode finds Xena fighting to regain life after losing it in battle. Meanwhile, Gabrielle becomes an Amazonian queen.
episodes.title: The Quest (2)

episodes.synopsis: The only way for a desperate Xena to stop a ruthless Amazon-turned-god from killing Gabrielle is to strike a deal with the now-immortal Callisto.
episodes.title: A Necessary Evil

episodes.synopsis: It's a nail-biting race against time as Xena and Gabrielle work to protect two different villages in the same 24-hour period.
episodes.title: A Day in the Life

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to a mother-and-son feud between Aphrodite and Cupid, Joxer has become a gallant war hero who springs to action at the sound of a bell.
episodes.title: For Him the Bell Tolls

episodes.synopsis: When an old friend of Gabrielle's is accused of murder, Gabrielle is quick to believe he's innocent -- but Xena suspects he's guilty.
episodes.title: The Execution

episodes.synopsis: An ambitious warrior sets out to kill Xena but only blinds her. Of course, losing her sight isn't enough to keep Xena from trying to rescue Gabrielle.
episodes.title: Blind Faith

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the Trojan War, Ulysses sets his sights on going home. But he'll need Xena and Gabrielle's help to get past the Sirens and Poseidon.
episodes.title: Ulysses

episodes.synopsis: When Xena pulls out all the stops to defeat the menacing Horde, a dispirited Gabrielle fears her friend has reverted to ruthlessness.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a violent shipwreck, Gabrielle finds herself separated from Xena and made prisoner aboard a vessel run by cursed pirates.
episodes.title: The Lost Mariner

episodes.synopsis: As a result of a misdirected love spell, Xena finds herself falling for her enemy Draco -- while Draco is increasingly attracted to Gabrielle.
episodes.title: A Comedy of Eros

episodes.synopsis: Xena is on the brink of madness after the Furies hand down their judgment of Xena's failure to avenge her father's death.
episodes.title: The Furies

episodes.synopsis: Until Xena discovers how to prevent a village tragedy, Joxer will be killed and reborn in a market dispute on each passing day.
episodes.title: Been There, Done That

episodes.synopsis: When Ares bestows the weapons and armor of Hephaestus on the warlord Agathon, Xena recruits four of her protégés to join her and Gabrielle in battle.
episodes.title: The Dirty Half Dozen

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle journey to Britannia to aid in a rebellion against Caesar. There, a mysterious priest traps Gabrielle into summoning the god Dahak.
episodes.title: The Deliverer

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle gives birth to a baby girl, the offspring of the dark god Dahak and Xena fears that the child is destined to bring evil into the world.
episodes.title: Gabrielle's Hope

episodes.synopsis: Despite Gabrielle's reservations, Xena is summoned to the ancient land of Chin to kill a man she left alive years before.
episodes.title: The Debt: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Xena's mission to Chin results in her imprisonment, as Gabrielle discovers too late the treachery of the Chin prince Ming T'ien.
episodes.title: The Debt: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Joxer, Gabrielle and Autolycus must thwart a plan by Joxer's brother Jett to kill the visiting Queen Cleopatra. Where is Xena when they need her?
episodes.title: The King of Assassins

episodes.synopsis: Xena plays detective to uncover the truth behind a plot to kill the Hestian virgin high priestess Leah, who looks exactly like Xena.
episodes.title: Warrior...Priestess...Tramp

episodes.synopsis: Aphrodite, jealous of Xena's fame and heroism, puts a spell on Gabrielle's scroll that makes everything written on it become real.
episodes.title: The Quill Is Mightier

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle encounter Hope, Gabrielle's daughter with the evil deity Dahak, and she releases Callisto in a quest to kill Xena's son, Solan.
episodes.title: Maternal Instincts

episodes.synopsis: Callisto leads Xena and Gabrielle through a mystical place called Illusia, where their inner demons -- pain, anger and grief -- become all too real.
episodes.title: The Bitter Suite

episodes.synopsis: Xena single-handedly defends Greece from the invading Persian army while Gabrielle is slowly being killed by a poisoned arrow.
episodes.title: One Against an Army

episodes.synopsis: A young teenaged girl named Tara picks a fight with Gabrielle, hoping to supplant her as Xena's sidekick.
episodes.title: Forgiven

episodes.synopsis: Xena joins forces with a pair of con men to avenge Joxer, who was beaten by a casino owner's sadistic thugs.
episodes.title: King Con

episodes.synopsis: When a freedom fighter from Gaul is captured by Caesar, Xena captures one of Caesar's men in hopes of arranging a prisoner exchange.
episodes.title: When in Rome

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle, tormented by her past, contemplates erasing her memories in the temple of Mnemosyne -- only those of Xena will be wiped clean as well.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: Aphrodite steals a diamond to try and control the North Star. As Xena, Gabrielle and Joxer try to reclaim it, each falls under a spell of obsession.
episodes.title: Fins, Femmes and Gems

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle are tricked into boarding a slave ship to rescue Autolycus, only to be trapped on board when Mount Etna erupts, causing a tsunami.
episodes.title: Tsunami

episodes.synopsis: A magic statue that keeps the peace between two villages is stolen, and Autolycus, the prime suspect, needs Xena's help to prove his innocence.
episodes.title: Vanishing Act

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle discover that Seraphin hopes to resurrect Gabrielle's evil daughter, Hope, allowing the dark god Dahak to return.
episodes.title: Sacrifice: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Hope is reborn in the image of Gabrielle, Callisto joins forces with Xena, Gabrielle and Joxer to destroy her and prevent Dahak from returning.
episodes.title: Sacrifice: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Xena's quest to recover Gabrielle's soul, sacrificed in the destruction of Hope, will take her from Siberia to the Amazon Land of the Dead.
episodes.title: Adventures in the Sin Trade: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the Land of the Dead, Xena leads a revolt of restless souls against oppression from the evil Alti, hoping to release Gabrielle from the underworld.
episodes.title: Adventures in the Sin Trade: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Xena believes she's finally found Gabrielle, only to discover that it's actually Hope, Gabrielle's evil daughter.
episodes.title: A Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: Joxer needs Xena and Gabrielle's assistance in fighting the Scythians, but both women have come down with mysterious ailments.
episodes.title: In Sickness and In Hell

episodes.synopsis: As Caesar's battle with Pompey bleeds into the Greek countryside, Xena and the Greek army struggle to push the war back onto Rome.
episodes.title: A Good Day

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle's friend Tara is imprisoned in a village where dancing is against the law. Xena and Gabrielle enlist Autolycus's help to set Tara free.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Muses

episodes.synopsis: Xena willingly allows herself to be arrested and sent to Shark Island Prison for a murder she didn't commit.
episodes.title: Locked Up and Tied Down

episodes.synopsis: Xena must rescue Gabrielle when she falls under the spell of a prophet named Najara, whose righteous talk and pure exterior hide sinister beliefs.
episodes.title: Crusader

episodes.synopsis: While defending a village from an attack, Xena finds everything about the incident very familiar, coming face to face with some truths about her past.
episodes.title: Past Imperfect

episodes.synopsis: Autolycus sets out to find a mystical key that will allow him to possess the Crown of Athena, and discovers that sometimes a "key" isn't always a key.
episodes.title: The Key to the Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle attempt to rescue a woman who was abducted by the Horde as a young girl, who is now reluctant to leave her captors.
episodes.title: Daughter of Pomira

episodes.synopsis: Xena, Gabrielle, Joxer and Aphrodite return a runaway princess to her father and stepmother, telling her some fractured fairy tales along the way.
episodes.title: If the Shoe Fits...

episodes.synopsis: While taking refuge from a storm, Xena and Gabrielle encounter a mystic named Aiden who may not be the gentle man he claims to be.
episodes.title: Paradise Found

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle saves a man from demonic possession. She is revered as a "Devi," but Xena is suspicious of the source of her friend's healing abilities.
episodes.title: Devi

episodes.synopsis: An Indian ritual sends Xena and Gabrielle into the future for another encounter with the shamaness Alti of the Amazon Land of the Dead.
episodes.title: Between the Lines

episodes.synopsis: Xena must summon the god Krishna for help as she battles the evil demon Indrajit, who has abducted both Gabrielle and Eli.
episodes.title: The Way

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle's lost scroll is discovered by the sly con artist/queen Zehra, who loves the story and wants to turn it into a play.
episodes.title: The Play's the Thing

episodes.synopsis: The platitude-spouting Najara returns, claiming to have found the key to nonviolence, just as Joxer struggles with the guilt of his first kill.
episodes.title: The Convert

episodes.synopsis: Family and friends gathered at Xena's mother's tavern for Gabrielle's birthday become suspects when a bounty hunter is killed.
episodes.title: Takes One to Know One

episodes.synopsis: Ephiny, Queen of the Amazons, is murdered by Caesar's deputy, Brutus, and Gabrielle succeeds her on the throne, but her rule is soon tested.
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: Callisto emerges from the Underworld to make Caesar the emperor, but Caesar's own men are about to commit one of history's most notorious murders.
episodes.title: The Ides of March

episodes.synopsis: In modern-day America, a woman named Annie believes she was Xena, warrior princess, in a past life, and a new age practitioner tells her all about it.
episodes.title: Deja Vu All Over Again

episodes.synopsis: Adrift in the afterlife after enduring painful deaths by crucifixion, Xena and Gabrielle join forces with the archangel Michael to combat Callisto.
episodes.title: Fallen Angel

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a miraculous resurrection, Xena and Gabrielle spring back to life. But Xena has no recollection of her former life as a warrior.
episodes.title: Chakram

episodes.synopsis: Fused together into a single body by the ruthless Ares, Xena and Gabrielle are forced to battle the female warrior Mavican -- to the death.
episodes.title: Succession

episodes.synopsis: While staying in the town of Spamona with Gabrielle, Amarice, Joxer and his friend Arman, Xena begins to show signs that she could be pregnant.
episodes.title: Animal Attraction

episodes.synopsis: With one eye on Xena's unborn child, the evil Alti attempts to drain the baby's life force so she can enter the physical world as a human being.
episodes.title: Them Bones, Them Bones

episodes.synopsis: With Gabrielle and Joxer in tow, Xena returns to the town of Chin to wrestle Lao Ma's book of power from the hands of an evil-minded twin.
episodes.title: Purity

episodes.synopsis: A vision draws Xena andGabrielle back to the city of Chin, where the warlord Khan has joined forces with the evil spirits Pao Ssu and Ming T'ien.
episodes.title: Back in the Bottle

episodes.synopsis: In a classic case of miscommunication, the goddess Aphrodite attempts to switch Xena's body with that of a dying young girl.
episodes.title: Little Problems

episodes.synopsis: In the 100th episode, Xena and Gabrielle pool their resources to protect Eli from Ares's and Xena learns the identity of her unborn baby's father.
episodes.title: Seeds of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Gabrielle recounts an eventful day to Aphrodite in which she and her horse, Argo, were miniaturized by Lachrymose, the god of despair.
episodes.title: Punch Lines

episodes.synopsis: When Zeus learns that Xena's unborn child is part of a prophecy that foretells Zeus's demise, he launches an attack against the pregnant warrior.
episodes.title: God-Fearing Child

episodes.synopsis: Xena finally gives birth to her baby, a precious girl she names Eve. But the infant is still a target of the gods' unquenchable wrath.
episodes.title: Eternal Bonds

episodes.synopsis: Upon arriving in Amphipolis to visit Xena's mother, Gabrielle, Xena and her new baby, Eve, learn that they're surrounded by Athena's army.
episodes.title: Amphipolis Under Siege

episodes.synopsis: A merman looking for love convinces a confused Gabrielle -- who fell unconscious into the ocean -- that she's the wife and the mother of his children.
episodes.title: Married with Fishsticks

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in the Amazon village, Xena and Gabrielle face the prospect of war and decide to delay their plans of making baby Eve an Amazonian princess.
episodes.title: Lifeblood

episodes.synopsis: A conflicted Gabrielle is forced to make an choice between remaining in the Amazon village as its queen or leave to roam free with Xena and Eve.
episodes.title: Kindred Spirits

episodes.synopsis: A long-lost scroll tells an aging Joxer of Xena and Gabrielle's tireless battle to protect the baby Eve and set the Twilight of the Gods in motion.
episodes.title: Looking Death in the Eye

episodes.synopsis: After awakening from a 25-year deep freeze, Xena and Gabrielle launch a search for Eve, who is now grown.
episodes.title: Livia

episodes.synopsis: As part of a ruthless campaign to wipe out Eli's followers, Xena's daughter, Eve -- now known as Livia, has killed hundreds of innocent people.
episodes.title: Eve

episodes.synopsis: Upon discovering that Livia is actually Eve, the gods renew their pledge to kill her and protect their own existence. But Xena has a secret weapon.
episodes.title: Motherhood

episodes.synopsis: After her victory over the Olympians, Xena encounters Ares, who asks her to help him regain his godly powers by battling the Amazons.
episodes.title: Coming Home

episodes.synopsis: Xena, Gabrielle and Eve are under attack by evil supernatural forces when Mephistopheles and his army of ghoulish creatures invade Amphipolis.
episodes.title: The Haunting of Amphipolis

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer tries to talk Xena into replacing Mephistopheles as the ruler of Hell, but the warrior princess plots to turn the tables on the archangel.
episodes.title: Heart of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: When Gabrielle's niece Sarah is kidnapped by evil African warlord Gurkhan, Xena infiltrates his harem to rescue her, but Gabrielle may blow her cover.
episodes.title: Who's Gurkhan?

episodes.synopsis: Two warring African tribes proclaim Xena and Gabrielle goddesses and ask them to stop the Romans from invading.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Xena and Gabrielle set out to save Virgil from a band of cannibals. When Gabrielle is captured by them, Xena must rescue not one but two friends.
episodes.title: The Abyss

episodes.synopsis: Xena's past love affair with Odin catches up with her. After a chance encounter with Beowulf, Xena sets out to destroy the monster Grinhilda.
episodes.title: The Rheingold

episodes.synopsis: Xena learns that she's killed Grindl, not his monstrous mother Grinhilda. Xena's victory over her archenemy may lie in the hands of Brunnhilda.
episodes.title: The Ring

episodes.synopsis: Xena reveals her connection to Odin, Grinhilda and a magic golden ring. While Xena and Beowulf fight for the ring, Brunnhilda kidnaps Gabrielle.
episodes.title: Return of the Valkyrie

episodes.synopsis: When a gang of warriors goes hunting for the now-mortal Ares, Xena hides him at her childhood home disguised as a farmer.
episodes.title: Old Ares Had a Farm

episodes.synopsis: After killing the Amazon queen, evil Prince Morloch sets his sights on Amazon princess Varia and her guardian, Xena.
episodes.title: Dangerous Prey

episodes.synopsis: Caligula embarks on a reign of terror, and Archangel Michael begs Xena to intervene. But her plan is jeopardized when he kidnaps Aphrodite.
episodes.title: The God You Know

episodes.synopsis: A reporter stumbles upon the story of a lifetime when he decides to uncover Xena's reason for returning to the Norse lands.
episodes.title: You Are There

episodes.synopsis: When Eve is kidnapped by Queen Varia and sentenced to die for things she did in a previous life, Xena and Gabrielle rush to save her.
episodes.title: Path of Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: Bellerophon kidnaps queen Varia, and it's up to Xena and Gabrielle to save her. But Xena loses her strength and Gabrielle must rescue Varia alone.
episodes.title: To Helicon and Back

episodes.synopsis: When present-day fans attempt to clone their idol Xena and her friend Gabrielle, they unwittingly unleash an evil version of the warrior princess.
episodes.title: Send in the Clones

episodes.synopsis: When Lord Belach's daughter disappears with a young centaur, Xena and Gabrielle are caught in the middle of an explosive feud.
episodes.title: The Last of the Centaurs

episodes.synopsis: Caesar escapes Hades and uses the Fates' powers to create a new future with Xena as his wife, Brutus his associate, and Gabrielle as a playwright.
episodes.title: When Fates Collide

episodes.synopsis: En route to Thebes to return Hermes's helmet to the king, Xena and Gabrielle rescue Genia, a virgin who was about to be sacrificed in a ritual.
episodes.title: Many Happy Returns

episodes.synopsis: A present-day Xena is besieged by the press when it's revealed that the warrior princess was once Ares's wife, a tale told through flashbacks.
episodes.title: Soul Possession

episodes.synopsis: In Part 1 of the season finale, Xena and Gabrielle are called to Japan to stop a warrior ghost from destroying the village of Higuchi.
episodes.title: A Friend in Need: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In Part 2 of the season finale, Xena gives up her life to defeat the samurai ghost and save tens of thousands of souls from a horrible fate.
episodes.title: A Friend in Need: Part 2
